attributes.action: Could someone in government tell us how many really live in our country?
attributes.additional_details:
Its a question no one seems to want to ask or answer, before Labour opened up our borders in 1997 it was always said that around 63 million lived here, that was then!
I 'am sure people in government know that figure right now, but still if pushed its 63 million,
Should the people not be told how many live here, or are the government worried if the figures really got out how shocked people would be, no wonder we're running out of things like gas, every town and city has had massive supermarket builds since 1997,
At a guess i beleve there must be 80 million living in the UK right now.

rejection.details: As this is a request for information rather than a request for a change in government policy, this cannot be the subject of an e-petition.
